reviews.review: Do I need to say anything?
Невероятно динамичная игра изученая всеми вдоль и поперёк. Так СТОП! Неужели не изучена? Так вперед и с песней!
Одна из любимых игр. Периодически возвращаюсь, чтобы побегать и пострелять. Крайне динамичная, а местами предлагает в меру сложные и необычные моменты.

El juego que me ha dado mas satisfacciones desde que empecé a jugar en PC. Hasta el día de hoy sigue siendo mi juego favorito, pues aun siento la adrenalina al jugar en crossfire con mis amigos. Una completa belleza.

10/10 A classic, and the grandfather to most modern day FPS's.
神作！！永远的经典！！！

Anyone who has at least moderately played games has heard of Half-Life, most likely due to the overhype of Half-Life 3. So, during one of the glorious steam sales, I decided to see what the fuck this was about. Picked up the game, decided to avoid my family over Thanksgiving via playing it. Even the tutorial was quite fun, mainly due to the end where I decided to shoot a few guards and made it out alive. The best part so far, however, was the fact that even with all the hype surrounding the game, it still turns out to be an enjoyable experience. It justifies my unusually heightened terror levels when playing any video game, as EVERYTHING WANTS TO KILL YOU. You even get dancing old guys. Overall, an extremely enjoyable experience.
10/10 Would play again.
A classic that I even enjoyed today, Half life even today still holds up as a fun game to play whether its fragining in multiplayer or roaming the halls of black mesa.
potato

Este juego, lanzado en 1998, marca un antes y un después en la manera de hacer juegos FPS, puesto que ya no se trata sólo de pegar tiros. A medida que se avanza en el juego se va desenvolviendo la historia, y el propio diseño del juego es el que enseña al jugador las pautas que debe seguir para poder progresar en el juego.

Personalmente no me suelen gustar los juegos FPS, pero Half-Life es más que un FPS. Es un juego digno de ser estudiado.
El juego es una chingoneria c:
12 sene oldu hala ilk günki heyecan <3<3
es una joya, lo unico que voy a decir es, compralo y juegalo, vas aver que tu dinero valio la pena <3

You have made a life-long mistake, not having played this game. You are literally dumb if you haven't grabbed it yet, and straight-played the entire game to it's finish just to complete it. Valve's best and worst creation, all in one game series. Great, because it exists. Worst, because there won't be an Episode 3. Ever.

WOAH..... hat mich grad übelst gefesselt, nach etwa 19 Jahren... unglaublich wie schnell die Zeit vergeht. Nicht nur für Half Life Fans sondern auch "neue" die interessiert an einer Wahnsinnig guten Story sind und denen die Grafik dabei keine Rolle spielt!

Poco da dire, qualsiasi cosa sarebbe uno spoiler. Bisogna comprarlo e giocarlo. Nel caso foste poco convinti aspettate i saldi e prendetelo a 0,99€. Va giocato per cultura videoludica, è un pezzo di storia. Probabilmente Valve non sarebbe arrivata dove si trova adesso se non fosse per questo gioco.
Dobre 10/10

Güzel Oyun

This has got to be the best game i have ever played. I love everything about it even the graphics. I think all the controlls are good and the gameplay is amazing. The story is mind blowing but could use some fixing up a bit. Overall i love this game to bits and i will remember  it for the rest of my life. I rate this game 10/10 thank you valve for making this master peace. If you have not played this yet i strongly recommend giving this game a go.

If you want to get the full Half-Life story/experience play the games in this order:

Half Life (Or Half Life: Source)
Black Mesa(A remake of Half-Life 1 but it tells the story of Half-Life 1 better) (You can skip it)
Half Life: Decay (skippable - it only came out on PS2 but you can go to this site to download it: https://www.moddb.com/mods/half-life-decay/downloads) (If you need help trying to download it watch this video: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=XuVZyTpIa6Y) 
Half Life: Opposing Force.
Half Life: Blue Shift.
Half Life 2.
Half Life 2: Episode One.
Half Life 2: Episode Two.

Have Fun :)
eeeeeeeeeeeeee  coooooooool
比我年龄还大的游戏，我居然还能玩这么久。。。。小时候看表哥们拿白色的大砖头旧型主机玩就觉得十分有意思，算是补个童年宅吧！
Первая в жизни игра-экшен от первого лица! Восторгался графикой в 2000 году!))) Маст хэв для всех, кому сейчас 25-30 лет для ностальгии и наслаждения хоть и линейным но закрученным сюжетом.

我接触的第一款游戏，但是没打过单人。后来的HL2才让我真正认识这个系列。上初中时的一次暑假我通关了HL2三部曲，才发现整个系列有多么精彩，从那时开始科幻类游戏成为了我的最爱，本以为会有Episode 3或者第三部的，结果等到我上大学的时候还是毛都没有，以后大概也不会有了。
我记得当初在网吧玩1代的时候是在CS1.5里激活的，好像还要输入激活码什么的挺简单的，然后进去和同学联机互撕，现在想想都感觉很爽，不过也只能是想想了。

Life is not simple any more,and Half-Life cannot make it simple either.
